citations.narrative:
Item Annual report 2.36 b 5
At the time of inspection the annual report for 2014 was reviewed . The facility reported 92 rice rats in category C,
however it only listed 22 rice rats in Category F, which is the sum of the numbers for category C, D and E.
The facility has to review its numbers for the use of rice rats and submit a corrected annual report to the USDA.
Facility is submitting an amended report with the correct numbers
correct from this day 8/24/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection

narrative:
2.36(b)(5)
ANNUAL REPORT.
Item Annual report 2.36 b 5
At the time of inspection the annual report for 2014 was reviewed . The facility reported 92 rice rats in category C,
however it only listed  22 rice rats in Category F,  which is the sum of the numbers for category C, D  and E.
The facility has to review its numbers for the use of rice rats and submit a corrected annual report to the USDA.
Facility is submitting an amended report with the correct numbers
                                                                                                         correct from this day 8/24/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection
